TopicTitle: Rate the signature of the user above you

Articles.Content: <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">0/10 I don't get it.</font>

6/10 Just text and links.

(I would explain my signature but it's spoilers for the latter game)
1/10 Sorta get it now.
5/10 There's actually more links than I think there was.
8/10 I like your badges.

10/10 I agree with the Comic Sans thing.

Speaking about my badges, I need to update my achievements ribbon.
2/10. I don't get it.
10/10 I finally took time to *read* your signature, and I agree that Eeloo and Dres are underappreciated.
I don't get it, but now I think about it, some other people might like it. 5-10.
1/10 too many links. therefore narcissistic.
4.8987878789999911100000/10 points. Tries to hard to strike fear into my dear Kerbals.

7/10 Lots of links, but the formatting could be better. I particularly don't trust the number of fonts involved.

Spoiler

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") Ya like yer apple- gets hit in the face with apple

4/10 - too busy imo, try using some of [these design principles](https://blog.adobespark.com/2016/07/27/8-basic-design-principles-to-help-you-create-better-graphics/) to improve it. Also, all your links at the bottom run into each other and it looks like one big link.
